2025-12-19PMOPublic Service Employment ActAppointment of the Deputy Clerk of the Privy Council and Associate Secretary to the CabinetAppointment of Isabelle Mondou of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Deputy Clerk of the Privy Council and Associate Secretary to the Cabinet, to hold office during pleasure, effective January 12, 2026.N/A
subject: Appointment of the Deputy Clerk of the Privy Council and Associate Secretary to the Cabinet
precis: Appointment of Isabelle Mondou of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Deputy Clerk of the Privy Council and Associate Secretary to the Cabinet, to hold office during pleasure, effective January 12, 2026.
